name: WFRG 88.3FM
description:
An homage to WRCT 88.3FM created for the Wholesome Games Jam 2022 with Bitsy. 

We didn't quite finish our game begore the jam ended but enjoy exploring what we made anyways!

Credits
  • Carol He - Art
  • Jonathan Fischer - Music
  • Scott King - Programming

Attributions

Bitsy game maker by Adam Le Doux
The following Bitsy hacks are used in this project

  • bitsymuse by David Mowatt
  • dialog audio vocal synth by Sean S. LeBlanc
  • favicon-from-sprite by mildmojo
  • transparent sprites by Sean S. LeBlanc
